Blackstorm:

Blackestorm moved, jumped, dodged, the shots as best as she can. In 
one of those moment she was hit in her wing "AAHHHHHH"shouted with 
pain but quickly and instpie of her pain she shot three energy-balls 
against Maxima.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/27/03 12:00:42 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Blackstorm cursed and she shot three energy-fireballs, one of 
them 
> > against Maxima's legs.
> > 
> > 
> 
> Missing 2, the 3rd made it's mark on her legs. 
> 
> "ARRGHHH!" A tiger & hawk mixed shreek came from her as she fell 
back & 
> rolled.
> 
> She got up. "Good. You did well." putting one sword away. Then 
pulled out a 
> weapon... a plasma pistol!
> 
> "Hope you are agile!" she fired rapid rounds at 
Blackstorm. "DANCE!"
